com.netflix.genie.web.configs.aws

Class AwsS3Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.configs.aws.AwsS3Config

  • @Profile(value="s3")
 @Configuration
public class AwsS3Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Beans and configuration specifically for S3 connection on AWS.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • awsCredentialsFromFile

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnProperty(value="genie.aws.credentials.file")
public com.amazonaws.auth.ClasspathPropertiesFileCredentialsProvider awsCredentialsFromFile(@Value(value="${genie.aws.credentials.file}")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String credentialsFilePath)
        Create the credentials needed for the application to be able to connect to Aws. Only triggered if the property cloud.aws.credentials.provided is set to true in the config.
        Parameters:
        credentialsFilePath - The path of the file containing aws credentials
        Returns:
        AWS credentials object to use to connect to AWS

      • awsCredentialsProvider

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnProperty(value="genie.aws.credentials.role")
public com.amazonaws.auth.STSAssumeRoleSessionCredentialsProvider awsCredentialsProvider(@Value(value="${genie.aws.credentials.role}")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String roleArn)
        Assume role credentials provider which will be used to fetch session credentials.
        Parameters:
        roleArn - Arn of the IAM role
        Returns:
        Credentials provider to ask the credentials from

      • genieS3Client

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentialsProvider.class)
public com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client genieS3Client(@Value(value="${genie.retry.s3.noOfRetries:5}")
                                                                                                                                               int noOfS3Retries,
                                                                                                                                               com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentialsProvider awsCredentialsProvider)
        A bean providing a client to work with S3.
        Parameters:
        noOfS3Retries - No. of S3 request retries
        awsCredentialsProvider - A credentials provider used to instantiate the client.
        Returns:
        An amazon s3 client object

      • s3FileTransferImpl

        @Bean(name={"file.system.s3","file.system.s3n","file.system.s3a"})
 @Order(value=1)
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client.class)
public FileTransfer s3FileTransferImpl(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client s3Client,
                                                                                                                                                                                                     com.netflix.spectator.api.Registry registry)
                                                                                                                                                                                              throws GenieException
        Returns a bean which has an s3 implementation of the File Transfer interface.
        Parameters:
        s3Client - S3 client to initialize the service
        registry - The metrics registry to use
        Returns:
        An s3 implementation of the FileTransfer interface
        Throws:
        GenieException - if there is any problem
